version_description: Download the app now. We synchronized graph and map in all three segments (Oman, GCC, World).
We have added Tabular data for all countries with information about the COVID19 pandemic.
We sorted the tabular data and provide a graph in the Map.
We included nearby detection of quarantine areas, using installed beacons that were issued by the Ministry of Health.

We've added different charts to represent data in the regions and wilayats.
Download this version now!
minor change in displaying the charts in the app.
a major change in displaying the map and adding dashboard in the app.

Added CSV Export.
Improvement in about page.
Fixed layout on the old iOS phone on the call & Donation page.
Change in the chart on the map to show a number on Y-axis.
Editing of dark mode colour on the dashboard.
Enabled caching in the Dashboard page
Improvement in performance and fixed minor bugs.
*improvement for the old device.

Here it is... Tarassud+ version 3.3
Download now and be able to register, as part of the travel entry requirement to visit the sultanate of Oman.
You can now register in the app before your arrival date, for a hassle-free travel experience.
Updated Arabic terms and bugfix for travel registration.
Added URLs for Customer Service contact, Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) and other Privacy Policy information.
Bugfix for traveller registration
A redirection site in the Traveller Registration page.
* adding vaccination in case register page
* Fix bugs & improvment

- We've Added Widget support, for iOS 14.0 +
•Statistics (small)

*See the latest updates of COVID-19 in Oman from your Home screen*
*General improving
*Bugs fixing

• Improved map.
• Correcting wrong country names.
